overview: A mistress got angry with a sheep and a goat and threw them out the door and said that they no longer dared to show up on the doorstep. What should this a little clumsy and cowardly couple do? So they went to look for a shelter. Funny, mysterious and unexpected adventures will fall out on the buddies’ road, and they will handle with all of them and even make friends with their brethren.
title: The Goat and the Sheep
